thread.title: Israel Steps Up Security After Deaths Of 8 Israelis, Palestinians
thread.title_full: Israel Steps Up Security After Deaths Of 8 Israelis, Palestinians

author: Emily Harris
title: Israel Steps Up Security After Deaths Of 8 Israelis, Palestinians
text:
Israel Steps Up Security After Deaths Of 8 Israelis, Palestinians October 05, 2015 4:27 PM ET Facebook Twitter 
Audio for this story from All Things Considered will be available at approximately 7:00 p.m. ET. 
A significant increase in violence has led to the deaths of eight Israelis and Palestinians in recent days, highlighting tensions and prompting an Israeli security crackdown.
